issue.title: Typo: Use of non-existing function exception()

discussion.p: The paragraph 4 refers to the function exception() which is not defined. Probably, the referred function is basic_ios<>::exceptions().

resolution.p: In , , paragraph 1, , paragraph 3, and , paragraph 1, change "exception()" to "exceptions()".
resolution.note: Note to Editor: "exceptions" with an "s" is the correct spelling.
